name: Colors to Variables
description:
Hey! Here is my first figma plugin. Using this plugin, you can get all of your local Figma styles as css/scss variables.


I made this plugin because, at my fulltime job (Basework), we create a lot of UI development. And almost every design comes with Figma. And it is really boring to add new variables to Scss.(you know, copy color, add new variable and stuff like this...) And that's why i've made it.


How to use:

  • Create local styles for your project
  • Open extension
  • Press CSS or SCSS button
  • And copy your colors

That's all!
